member.name: T:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController
member.summary: Define endpoints to perform operations with files and files metadata

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.#ctor(BuisnessLogicLayer.Interfaces.IFileService,WebAPI.Utilities.JwtHandler)
member.summary: Initialize new instance of FileController
member.param: FileService instanse. Provides operations with file objects.
JwtHandler instanse. Generate JWT. Retrive userId from JWT

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.GetOwn(BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.QueryModel)
member.summary: Returns a page of sorted and filtered objects describing files uploaded by the user. Page size, query for filtering, property for sorting and sorting order are defined by QueryModel object
member.param: QueryModel object, incapsulate query options for pagination, sorting, filtering
member.returns: Returns filtered, sorted page of file metadata

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.GetOwnById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns an object describing the file owned by the user

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.DeleteOwn(System.Guid,BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.FileDataModel)
member.summary: Deletes a file owned by the user
member.returns: Status 200 Ok, if file delete successfuly, error code otherwise

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.DownloadOwn(System.Guid)
member.summary: Download a file owned by the user

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.UpdateOwn(System.Guid,BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.FileDataModel)
member.summary: Updates metadata about a file owned by the user
member.returns: Status 200 Ok, if file update successfuly, error code otherwise

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.GetShared(BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.QueryModel)
member.summary: Deprecated.

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.GetSharedById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns an object describing the file to which the user is granted access (the file does not belong to the user)

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.RefuseSharedById(System.Guid,BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.FileDataModel)
member.summary: The user is relinquishing the rights to view the file
member.returns: Status 200 if action successful, error code otherwise

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.Get(BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.QueryModel)
member.summary: Returns a page of sorted and filtered objects describing all files Page size, query for filtering, property for sorting and sorting order are defined by QueryModel object For execution needs "Administrator" permissions
member.param: QueryModel object, incapsulate query options for pagination, sorting, filtering
member.returns: Returns filtered, sorted page of file metadata

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns an object describing file For execution needs "Administrator" permissions

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.Delete(System.Guid,BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.FileDataModel)
member.summary: Delete file. For execution needs "Administrator" permissions
member.returns: Status 200 Ok, if file delete successfuly, error code otherwise

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.Download(System.Guid)
member.summary: Download file. For execution needs "Administrator" permissions

member.name: M:WebAPI.Controllers.FileController.Update(System.Guid,BuisnessLogicLayer.Models.FileDataModel)
member.summary: Updates metadata about file. For execution needs "Administrator" permissions
member.returns: Status 200 Ok, if file update successfuly, error code otherwise
